original_text: But houses in villages without walls around them are to be considered as belonging to the open country. They can be redeemed, and they are to be returned in the Jubilee.
korean_text: 그러나 성벽이 둘리지 아니한 촌락의 가옥은 나라의 전토와 같이 물러 주기도 할 것이요 희년에 돌려보내기도 할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: But houses in villages without walls around them
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 벽으로 둘러싸이지 않은 마을의 집들은

sentences.original_text: are to be considered as belonging to the open country
and they are to be returned in the Jubilee
